SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class UserTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.UserTest
public class UserTest extends Object
Unit tests for User.

These tests are designed to verify the synchronous logic within User while avoiding any real Firebase network calls or asynchronous Task behaviour. Firebase Realtime Database interactions are fully mocked using Mockito.

Test coverage includes:

  • Validation and trimming of profile update fields
  • Ensuring no writes occur when required fields are invalid
  • Static mocking of FirebaseDatabase.getInstance(String) to prevent real initialization
  • Reflection-based injection of FirebaseService mocks
  • Verification of expected write payloads for updateProfile() and createMockUser()

All tests execute synchronously and deterministically â€” no reliance on Tasks.await() or Android main-thread components.
